meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny, folks! It's your pal, back with another groovy review that's sure to make you smile. Today, we're diving into the world of Braid Anniversary Edition, a game that's been makin' waves in the gaming scene since its release way back in 2008.

Now, I know what you're thinkin', "What's the big deal about Braid?" Well, let me tell you, it's one of those games that'll make you laugh, cry, and maybe even give up on life a little (just kidding, or am I?). Seriously though, this game is like a puzzle-filled onion – the more you peel back, the more layers you discover. And trust me, once you get hooked, there's no goin' back!

Now, I know some of my fellow critics out there might be thinkin', "Oh boy, another remastered classic trying to cash in on nostalgia." But let me tell you, folks, Braid Anniversary Edition is more than just a rehash – it's like gettin' the band back together and puttin' on one heck of a show!

So, what makes this edition so special? For starters, those visuals are straight fire! You'll be transported to a world of beautiful, hand-drawn art that's as whimsical as it is whimsy. And don't even get me started on the puzzles – they're like tryin' to solve a giant puzzle box filled with cleverness and wit!

Now, I know some of you might be thinkin', "But what about the extras?" Well, let me tell you, there's plenty! You'll get those lovely new levels, commentary from the developers (which is as informative as it is entertaining!), and even a fancy new UI. And if you're feelin' extra adventurous, you can always try out the Time Attack mode – but be warned: those times are gonna fly by faster than you can say "Hippo Penny"!

All in all, Braid Anniversary Edition is like the ultimate time capsule – it's a game that'll make you laugh, cry, and maybe even give up on life (just kidding, or am I?). Seriously though, this game is an absolute must-play for anyone who loves puzzle-adventures, clever writing, or just plain ol' good storytelling. So grab your controller, get cozy, and get ready to experience one of the most iconic indie games out there!

And that's it, folks! If you've made it this far without fallin' asleep (I hope), I'll catch you on the flip side – stay groovy, and keep on gaming!
